an3.76:1: Then the Venerable Ānanda approached the Blessed One, paid homage to him, sat down to one side, and said to him:
an3.76:2: (1) "If, Ānanda, there were no kamma ripening in the sensory realm, would sense-sphere existence be discerned?"
an3.76:3: (2) "If, Ānanda, there were no kamma ripening in the form realm, would form-sphere existence be discerned?"
an3.76:4: (3) "If, Ānanda, there were no kamma ripening in the formless realm, would formless-sphere existence be discerned?"
